com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

Class KandyChatSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.KandyChatSettings

  • public class KandyChatSettings
extends Object
    The settings object to configure service specific configurations

    Note The default value to automatically download received media content is: ConnectionType.WIFI.
    You may change this value with: setAutoDownloadMediaConnectionType(ConnectionType)

    Note The default path to store automatically downloaded, received media content is: %externalStoarge\Kandy\media.
    You may change this value with setDownloadMediaPath(File).

      • getDownloadMediaPath

        @Deprecated
public File getDownloadMediaPath()
        Deprecated. use IKandyChatDownloadPathBuilder instead
        The absolute path to the location where the downloaded media content should be saved.

        Consider using Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() as your root folder

      • setDownloadMediaPath

        public void setDownloadMediaPath(IKandyChatDownloadPathBuilder downloadMediaPath)
        Set the path for downloaded media. Can specify own folder structure.

      • setDownloadMediaPath

        @Deprecated
public void setDownloadMediaPath(File downloadMediaPath)
        Deprecated. use IKandyChatDownloadPathBuilder instead
        Set the path for downloaded media. Note: The path must be to the directory not the path of the file
        Parameters:
        downloadMediaPath - new path to directory not the path of the file

                     throws KandyIllegalArgumentException
        Set uploaded media max size limitation.
        Parameters:
        mediaMaxSize - The value for max media size
        Throws:
        KandyIllegalArgumentException - Must be in range of [0, MESSAGE_MEDIA_MAX_SIZE]
        See Also:
